import React from 'react' const WeatherComponent = ({ Weather }) => { const days= [ "sunday",'Monday','Tuesday','Wednesday', 'Thursday', 'Friday', 'Saturday'] return ( <>

{Weather.location.name}, {Weather.location.country}

{Weather}
{Weather.current.wind_kph} kph ({Weather.current.wind_dir})
{Weather.current.cloud}
{Weather.current.temp_c}o C Feels like {Weather.current.cloud}o C
{Weather.current.is_day === 0 ? <> Night : <> Day}
) } export default WeatherComponent
